import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { getCookie } from "../../helpers/auth"; import "./profile.scss"; const Profile = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({}); let getProfileUrl = "http://localhost:5000/api/auth/user"; let getUserUrl = "http://localhost:5000/api/users/"; useEffect(() => { let token = getCookie("token"); axios .get(getProfileUrl, { headers: { Authorization: token, }, }) .then((res) => res.data.data) .then((data) => axios .get(getUserUrl + data.id) .then((res) => res.data) .then((data) => setUser(data)) ); }); return (

{user.name}

  • Hesabı Sil
